name: One Room Dungeon (CupOfIdeas)
description:
Trailer/gameplay:

Welcome to your doom!

In this game, your goal is to defeat the dark lord. Our only LOOT are the weapons that you'll find. But to defeat the boss, you'll need to clear 11 random dungeon stages. You will encounter enemies and a lots of weapons! 

[Instructions]

WSAD to move.

R to restart after death.

Go next to the weapon to pick it up.

Left click to shoot and right to roll.

When you are rolling, enemies and their bullets can't hurt you!

Good Luck!
